snippet: A day after taxi riders were allowed to hail yellow cabs with smartphones for the first time, an appeals court judge temporarily blocked the city’s pilot program for the apps.
abstract: Appeals court judge temporarily blocks program that allows New York City taxi riders to hail yellow cabs with smartphones, forcing Bloomberg administration to delay its plan for second time in less than two months.
lead_paragraph: A day after taxi riders were allowed to hail yellow cabs with smartphones for the first time, an appeals court judge temporarily blocked the city’s pilot program for the apps.
